sentences.en: Dangerous undertows make swimming unsafe along most of the coastline.
sentences.cn: 由于存在着危险的下层逆流，在大部分海岸线附近游泳都不安全。

sentences.en: Goldfish were swimming lazily in a group just under the surface.
sentences.cn: 金鱼聚在一起贴着水面懒洋洋地游着。

sentences.en: He had been, he said modestly, swimming champ at high school.
sentences.cn: 他谦逊地说，念中学时他曾经是游泳冠军。

sentences.en: His favourite childhood pursuits were sailing, swimming and cycling.
sentences.cn: 儿时他最大的爱好是帆船运动、游泳和骑自行车。

sentences.en: I also enjoy windsurfing, tennis, racquetball, swimming, you name it.
sentences.cn: 我也喜欢帆板、网球、短柄墙球、游泳等等，不一而足。

sentences.en: I felt a bit self-conscious in my swimming costume.
sentences.cn: 我穿着游泳衣觉得有点害羞。

sentences.en: If anything, swimming will appeal to her most strongly.
sentences.cn: 如果说有什么能强烈地吸引她，那就是游泳了。

sentences.en: It was the quickest swimming lesson I'd ever witnessed.
sentences.cn: 这是我所见过的最速成的游泳课。

sentences.en: Swimming is helpful for bones that are porous and weak.
sentences.cn: 游泳有助于改善骨质疏松和骨骼脆弱。

sentences.en: Swimming is probably the best form of exercise you can get.
sentences.cn: 游泳或许是现有的最佳锻炼方式。

sentences.en: The treatment rooms lead off from the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 从游泳池可以通到治疗室。

sentences.en: There are only 60 swimming pools in the entire country.
sentences.cn: 全国总共只有60个游泳池。

sentences.en: There was swimming and sailing down on the lake.
sentences.cn: 有人在湖上游泳和扬帆。

sentences.en: When I'm swimming I'm in a world of my own.
sentences.cn: 游泳的时候，我沉浸在自己的世界里。

sentences.en: You have a choice of co-ed or single-sex swimming exercise classes.
sentences.cn: 可以选择男女兼收或是分班的游泳课。

words.tran_cn: 游泳的；游泳用的；善于游泳的；晕眩的

trans.tran_cn: 游泳的；游泳用的；善于游泳的；晕眩的

trans.tran_en: the sport of moving yourself through water using your arms and legs

trans.tran_cn: 游泳( swim的现在分词)，漂浮，浸，泡，旋转
